_meta.description: Fallback responses when Ollama is unavailable or times out
_meta.author: Slave 2

friendly: Ah, my favorite customer returns! What treasures catch your eye today?
Welcome back, friend! I've set aside some special items just for you.
A pleasure to see you again! My finest wares await your discerning eye.
neutral: Welcome, traveler. Looking to buy or sell?
Greetings. Browse my wares - fair prices for all.
Come in, come in. Everything here is for sale.
hostile: What do you want? Make it quick.
You again? Better have coin this time.
State your business and be gone.

friendly: For you, I can offer a special price. What interests you?
Let me show you my finest goods - reserved for valued customers.
Take your time, friend. Quality merchandise deserves proper consideration.
neutral: See anything you like? All prices are negotiable.
Good stock today. Fresh from the caravans.
What catches your eye? I can make you a fair deal.
hostile: Buy something or leave. I don't have time for browsers.
Prices are marked. Take it or leave it.
Gold first, then we talk.

friendly: Safe travels, friend! Return soon!
May fortune favor your journeys. Until next time!
Come back anytime - I'll save the best items for you!
neutral: Farewell, traveler. Safe roads.
Until next time. Travel well.
Good day to you.
hostile: Finally. Don't let the door hit you.
Yes, yes, goodbye.
Off with you then.

friendly: I wish I could help, but the guild regulations prevent this trade. Perhaps another item?
My apologies, friend, but this particular deal cannot be made. What else interests you?
As much as I'd like to accommodate you, this falls outside what I can offer.
neutral: That's not something I can do. Anything else?
Sorry, can't help with that. Look at something else?
That's not available. Check my other wares.
hostile: No. Next?
Can't. Won't. Move on.
That's not happening. What else?

friendly: Whoa, whoa! Calm down, friend. Let's talk this through like civilized folk.
I understand you're upset, but threatening my shop won't solve anything!
Easy now! Whatever's wrong, we can work it out. No need for this!
neutral: Guards! GUARDS! This one's causing trouble!
Put that away before someone gets hurt! This is a place of business!
I won't be intimidated in my own shop! Leave now or face the consequences!
hostile: I KNEW you were trouble! Get out before I throw you out myself!
You think you can threaten ME? I've dealt with worse than you!
That's IT! You're banned from this shop permanently! OUT!

friendly: Ah, leaving already? Don't be a stranger - the shop's always open for you!
Take care out there! Remember, nobody beats my prices!
Until we meet again, friend! May your purse stay full!
neutral: Come back when you're ready to buy.
The door's always open. For paying customers.
Safe travels. Don't forget where to find quality goods.
hostile: Finally leaving? Don't let the door hit you.
Good. I've got real customers to attend to.
Don't hurry back.

friendly: Citizen! Good to see a familiar, law-abiding face.
Ah, it's you. The streets are safer with upstanding folk like yourself about.
Well met, friend. What brings you to this part of town?
neutral: Halt. State your business, traveler.
Move along. Nothing to see here.
Keep your nose clean and we'll have no trouble.
hostile: You. I've got my eye on you, troublemaker.
Don't try anything clever. I'm watching.
One wrong move and you'll see the inside of a cell.

friendly: Between us - I might know where to find certain... items. What do you need?
I shouldn't, but for you, I can make an exception. What are you looking for?
Keep this quiet, but I have access to confiscated goods.
neutral: Trading's not my job. Try the market.
I'm not a merchant. Seek your goods elsewhere.
The traders are that way. I just keep the peace.
hostile: What, trying to bribe me? Think carefully about your next words.
I don't deal with the likes of you.
Back off before I call for reinforcements.

friendly: Stay safe out there. Call if you need assistance.
May your roads be clear of bandits. Farewell!
Good day, citizen. The guard is here if you need us.
neutral: On your way then. Stay out of trouble.
Move along. The city watches.
Safe travels. Keep to the law.
hostile: Get out of my sight.
Don't let me catch you causing trouble.
I'll be watching for you.

friendly: There's a matter I could use help with - interested in earning the guard's gratitude?
You've proven trustworthy. I have a job that needs a capable hand.
I have a task that's too delicate for official channels. Care to hear more?
neutral: There might be work for someone with your skills. Interested?
I've got a job that needs doing. It pays fair coin.
Care to earn some gold helping the city guard?
hostile: Want to redeem yourself? I have a dangerous task that needs doing.
Prove you're not completely worthless. Take on this job.
Here's your chance to get back in our good graces.

friendly: Easy there, friend! Let's not do anything we'll both regret!
Calm yourself! I know you're upset, but I can't let this escalate!
Lower your weapon! Tell me what's wrong and we'll sort it out!
neutral: DROP IT! NOW! On the ground, hands where I can see them!
You're making a BIG mistake! Stand down before this gets ugly!
By order of the guard - cease and desist IMMEDIATELY!
hostile: I've been WAITING for you to slip up! You're under arrest!
Finally showing your true colors! Prepare to face justice!
That's it, criminal scum! You've just sealed your fate!

friendly: Stay safe, citizen! The guard watches over honest folk like yourself!
May your path be clear of trouble! We're here if you need us!
Go with the blessing of the watch! Report any suspicious activity!
neutral: Move along then. Stay out of trouble.
Dismissed. Keep to the law.
Go about your business. We'll be watching.
hostile: Get out of my district. I'll be keeping an eye out for you.
You're lucky I'm letting you walk. Don't push it.
Disappear. Before I change my mind about those charges.

friendly: Welcome back, dear guest! Your usual table is ready.
Ah, my favorite patron returns! Let me get your drink.
Come in, come in! It's always a pleasure to see you!
neutral: Welcome to my inn. What'll you have?
Traveler! Looking for a room or just a drink?
Come in from the cold. What can I get you?
hostile: You. I remember you. Behave yourself this time.
If you're here to cause trouble, save us both the time and leave.
One incident and you're out. Understood?

friendly: Food, drink, lodging - name it and it's yours, my friend.
Let me set you up with the finest room in the house.
For you, I've got something special cooking in the back.
neutral: Rooms are 10 gold. Meals are 2 each. Ale flows freely.
Got clean beds and hot food. What do you need?
Rest your feet and fill your belly. Here's what we offer.
hostile: Payment upfront. No credit for you.
Double rates. Take it or find somewhere else.
I'll serve you, but watch yourself.

friendly: Rest well! The door's always open for you!
Safe travels, and hurry back! You're always welcome here!
May the road be kind to you, friend!
neutral: Safe travels. Come back anytime.
Good luck out there. Road's rough these days.
Farewell, traveler.
hostile: Finally. Don't hurry back.
The door's that way.
Best if you find another inn next time.

friendly: Hey, hey, HEY! Put that down! We're all friends here!
What's gotten into you?! Sit down, have a drink, calm yourself!
I don't want any trouble from you! Let's talk this out!
neutral: Take it OUTSIDE! I won't have fighting in my establishment!
You want trouble? The city guard drinks here! GUARDS!
That's it - you're cut off and you're leaving NOW!
hostile: I KNEW you'd cause problems! Beric! Grab the club!
You think I survived running an inn by being weak? TRY ME!
You just made the biggest mistake of your pathetic life!

friendly: Off so soon? Your room will be waiting whenever you return!
Travel safe, friend! There's always a warm bed and cold ale here for you!
Come back anytime! You're family at this inn!
neutral: Room's available if you need it again. Safe travels.
The road's long. Remember where to find a good meal and rest.
Take care out there. We'll be here.
hostile: Door's that way. Try another inn next time.
Good. Don't come back until you've learned some manners.
You've worn out your welcome. Find somewhere else to drink.

friendly: Ah, my finest customer! Let me show you what I've been forging!
Welcome back! I've been expecting you - saved some choice steel!
The hammer sings for you, friend! What can I craft today?
neutral: Greetings. Looking for weapons or armor?
The forge is hot and ready. What do you need?
Steel and iron, friend. That's what I deal in.
hostile: What do you want? My time's valuable.
Hmph. State your business quickly.
Make it fast. I've real work to do.

friendly: For you, I'll put my best work forward. Examine these pieces!
I've crafted something special - tell me what you think.
My finest blades, at prices only a true friend would see.
neutral: Good steel here. Won't find better in the region.
Weapons, armor, repairs - I do it all.
Quality work at fair prices. See for yourself.
hostile: You get what everyone else gets. Nothing special.
Standard rates. No bargaining.
Buy or leave. I've got metal to shape.

friendly: May your blade strike true! Return soon, friend!
Stay sharp out there! The forge awaits your return!
Safe journeys! Come back when you need repairs!
neutral: Keep that blade oiled. Farewell.
Safe travels. Don't neglect your equipment.
Until next time. Steel serves you well.
hostile: Finally. Back to real work.
Don't dull any of my blades.
Off with you.

friendly: Whoa there! Put that down! I forged that blade - I know how sharp it is!
Friend! FRIEND! Let's not do something we'll both regret!
Easy now! The forge is hot and I've got a hammer - let's TALK instead!
neutral: You threaten ME? In MY forge? I've got red-hot iron right here!
Draw steel on a blacksmith? Bold move. STUPID, but bold!
BACK OFF! This hammer breaks more than horseshoes!
hostile: FINALLY! I've been waiting for an excuse! Come on then!
You picked the WRONG smith to mess with! I'll flatten you like pig iron!
That's it! I'm gonna forge your face into a new shape!

friendly: Keep that blade sharp, friend! The forge awaits your return!
May steel serve you well! Come back when you need repairs!
Off you go! Remember - nothing beats hand-forged quality!
neutral: Equipment needs care. Come back before it rusts.
Safe travels. Bring your gear if it needs mending.
The forge is always burning. Return when you need steel.
hostile: Out. Don't bring me anything to repair.
Leave. And don't expect service next time.
The door's that way. Find another smith.

friendly: Ah, a fellow seeker of knowledge! What mysteries shall we unravel today?
Welcome, my studious friend! I've discovered fascinating new texts!
How delightful! Come, let us discuss the nature of the cosmos!
neutral: Greetings, traveler. Do you seek knowledge?
The pursuit of wisdom brings you here, I presume?
Ah, another visitor. What brings you to my study?
hostile: You again? What do you want now?
My patience for interruptions grows thin.
Speak quickly - knowledge waits for no one.

friendly: I've procured some rare tomes that might interest you!
For a fellow intellectual, I can share certain... restricted materials.
Let me show you what the caravans brought from distant lands!
neutral: Books, scrolls, maps - I deal in information.
Knowledge has its price. What do you seek?
I might have what you're looking for. What subject interests you?
hostile: Information costs extra for your kind.
I suppose I could part with some lesser texts.
Quick transaction. What do you need?

friendly: May wisdom guide your path! Return with new discoveries!
Farewell, friend! The pursuit of knowledge never ends!
Safe travels! Remember - an open mind is the greatest weapon!
neutral: May your journey be enlightening.
Farewell. Seek truth in all things.
Until we meet again in the pursuit of knowledge.
hostile: Yes, yes. Goodbye.
Finally, some peace to study.
Do try to learn something before returning.

friendly: My friend, please! Violence is the refuge of the ignorant! Let us discuss this rationally!
Calm yourself! I have knowledge you want - destroying me would be illogical!
Think! THINK! Anger clouds judgment - you're better than this!
neutral: Stay back! These texts are irreplaceable! IRREPLACEABLE!
You barbaric fool! Knowledge takes centuries to accumulate!
Help! HELP! This lunatic is destroying priceless manuscripts!
hostile: HA! I KNEW your kind was all muscle and no brain!
Typical! When intellect fails you, resort to violence!
Go ahead! Prove what an utter IMBECILE you truly are!

friendly: Return soon with new discoveries to share! Knowledge awaits!
May your journey illuminate new truths! The library is always open!
Go forth and learn! Come back with tales of distant lands!
neutral: The pursuit of knowledge continues. Safe travels.
Return if you seek wisdom. Or don't. Either way.
The texts will be here. They've waited centuries.
hostile: Leave. And take your ignorance with you.
Good. Less distraction from important work.
The door. Use it. Don't return without a brain.

friendly: M'lord! Always a pleasure to see you in our humble village!
Bless you for coming! What can this simple farmer do for you?
Oh, it's you! The fields grow better when you're near, I swear it!
neutral: Greetings, traveler. Just a simple farmer here.
Aye, what brings you to these parts?
Hello there. Not much excitement around here.
hostile: What do you want? I've got work to do.
Hmph. Your kind isn't welcome here.
Best move along. Nothing for you here.

friendly: I've got fresh produce - and for you, the best picks!
Take what you need from the harvest. You've earned it!
Let me show you what the land has blessed us with!
neutral: Got some vegetables and grain. Interested?
Simple food, but honest. What do you need?
I can spare some supplies if the price is right.
hostile: If you've got coin, I've got food. That's all.
Premium prices for outsiders.
Take it or leave it. I don't bargain.

friendly: May the harvest bless you! Come back soon!
Safe roads, friend! The village prays for you!
Farewell! May your travels be fruitful!
neutral: Safe travels, then.
Good luck on the road.
Farewell, traveler.
hostile: Off with you then.
Don't come back.
Good riddance.

friendly: Please, m'lord! I beg you! I've got a family to feed!
What did I do wrong?! Tell me and I'll fix it!
Mercy! Have mercy on a simple farmer!
neutral: Help! HELP! Someone's gone mad!
Stay back! I'll use this pitchfork, I swear!
The whole village will hear about this! GUARDS!
hostile: I KNEW you were trouble! EVERYONE, ARM YOURSELVES!
You'll hang for this! The lord won't stand for brigands!
Come on then! I've faced worse than you at harvest time!

friendly: Gods bless you on your journey! Remember us simple folk!
May the harvest spirits guide you! Come back anytime!
Safe roads, m'lord! The village will sing of your kindness!
neutral: Take care on the road. Bandits about lately.
Farewell then. Fields don't tend themselves.
Off you go. Hope the weather holds.
hostile: Good. Don't let me see your face again.
Away with you. This village has memory.
Leave and stay gone. We don't forget.

friendly: Ah, my esteemed associate! Do come in - the servants have prepared refreshments!
A pleasure to see you again! Your reputation precedes you, as always!
Welcome, welcome! I was just speaking of your exploits to the court!
neutral: Greetings. You may address me as Lord/Lady of this estate.
A commoner with interesting prospects, I hear. What brings you here?
State your purpose. My time is valuable.
hostile: You dare approach me? Guards, be ready.
What audacity. Speak quickly before I lose patience.
I don't consort with the likes of you. Make it brief.

friendly: I have connections that might interest you - for a trusted ally, of course.
Let me introduce you to certain... opportunities befitting your status.
Between us, I know where the finest goods change hands.
neutral: I deal in influence and rare commodities. Can you afford my attention?
Perhaps we can arrange something mutually beneficial.
Interesting proposition. Let me consider what I can offer.
hostile: You think I'd trade with you? How amusing.
Come back when you've earned the right to speak to me.
The audacity. Guards, escort this person out.

friendly: Until we meet again, dear friend! The court speaks highly of you!
Farewell! May fortune continue to favor you!
Safe travels! Remember, you always have an ally in this house!
neutral: You may go. Perhaps we'll speak again.
Dismissed. Return when you have something worthwhile.
Farewell. The servants will show you out.
hostile: Guards, see them out. Immediately.
Do not return without proper credentials.
Begone from my sight.

friendly: My friend, please! Let us resolve this with civility! I have influence!
There's no need for violence! Whatever you want, we can negotiate!
Think of your reputation! This isn't worthy of either of us!
neutral: GUARDS! GUARDS! There's an assassin in my chambers!
You DARE threaten nobility?! You'll hang for this!
Do you know who I AM?! You'll rue this day!
hostile: So it comes to this! I should have had you executed long ago!
You peasant FILTH! My family will hunt you to extinction!
GUARDS! Seize this traitor! I want their head on a pike!

friendly: Do stay in touch, dear friend! The court awaits your tales!
May fortune favor you! Remember - you have allies in high places!
Until we meet again! Send word if you need anything!
neutral: You are dismissed. The servants will see you out.
Return when you have matters of import.
Leave. I have affairs of state to attend to.
hostile: Get out. And pray we don't meet again.
Be grateful I'm letting you leave with your head.
My patience has limits. Test them again at your peril.

friendly: Bless you, generous soul! Your kindness hasn't been forgotten!
Oh, it's you! The spirits smile when you walk by!
Friend! Friend! So good to see a kind face!
neutral: Spare a coin for a poor soul, traveler?
Times are hard, friend. Any kindness you can offer?
A copper? A crust? Anything helps, truly.
hostile: What, come to mock me? Move along.
I remember you. Not interested in your sneers.
Save your breath. I know your type.

friendly: I may look poor, but I hear things... valuable information for a kind soul.
For you, I'll share what the shadows whisper. No one pays attention to beggars.
A gift from the streets - secrets that might save your life.
neutral: Information for coin? The poor see everything the rich miss.
I know things. Worth a meal to share them.
Feed me and I'll tell you what moves through these streets.
hostile: Even beggars have their dignity. Find someone else.
Why should I help you? What have you ever given me?
Talk to the hand. The empty hand.

friendly: The gods bless you, kind soul! May fortune find you!
Thank you, thank you! You're a saint among sinners!
Bless your generous heart! Come back soon!
neutral: Safe travels, friend. Remember the poor.
Go with... well, go with whatever serves you.
Until next time, traveler.
hostile: Good riddance.
Don't expect my help when you're down.
May the road be as kind to you as you were to me.

friendly: Please! I've nothing to take! I'm already at the bottom!
Why?! What could you possibly want from a beggar?!
Mercy! The gods see everything! They'll punish cruelty to the poor!
neutral: HELP! SOMEONE! This one's gone mad!
Stay back! I may be poor but I'll fight!
You attack a BEGGAR?! What kind of monster ARE you?!
hostile: HA! Kill a beggar? I've got nothing to lose! Come on then!
You think I fear death?! I've wished for it for YEARS!
Do it! Free me from this miserable existence! COWARD!

friendly: Go with blessings, kind soul! May fortune find you soon!
The spirits watch over the generous! Travel safe!
Remember old Pockets if you find extra coin! Bless you!
neutral: Safe travels. Remember the poor when you can.
Off you go then. Spare a thought for those below.
Farewell. The streets are cold tonight.
hostile: Walk away. Just like everyone else.
Go. May your road be as hard as mine.
Leave. The gutters remember everyone eventually.

friendly: Blessings upon you, child. The light shines on your path.
Welcome, faithful one. How may I serve your spirit today?
Ah, a familiar face! The temple is always open to the devout.
neutral: May peace find you, traveler. What brings you to this holy place?
Welcome to our sanctuary. All are welcome in the light.
Greetings, friend. Seeking guidance or simply rest?
hostile: Even the wayward may find redemption. What do you want?
The temple does not turn away any soul, however... tarnished.
Speak. Perhaps confession would ease your burden.

friendly: The faithful receive blessings freely. What do you need?
Take these blessed items, child. May they guide your way.
Our stores are open to those who walk the righteous path.
neutral: The temple offers healing and blessings - for appropriate donations.
We have holy water, healing salves, and blessed talismans.
A small offering sustains our work. What do you seek?
hostile: Gold cleanses many sins. What would you purchase?
Even you may benefit from sacred items. The price is firm.
Commerce with the unrepentant... very well. Coin first.

friendly: Go with the blessing of the light, dear child!
May your path be bright and your spirit lighter!
Return soon! The faithful are always welcome!
neutral: Walk in peace, traveler. May you find what you seek.
The light guide your steps. Farewell.
Safe travels. Remember the temple in your prayers.
hostile: Perhaps next time you will show more... reverence.
Go. Reflect on your choices.
The temple will be here when you seek redemption.

friendly: Please, child! Violence solves nothing! Let the light calm your heart!
Think of your immortal soul! This path leads only to damnation!
I beg you, stop! The gods are watching! There is still time for peace!
neutral: This is a HOLY place! You DARE bring violence here?!
The gods will strike you down! REPENT before it's too late!
Stand back, heretic! The faithful will defend this temple!
hostile: So your true nature reveals itself at last, sinner!
The light protects the righteous! Come then, face divine judgment!
I've prayed for your downfall for YEARS! The gods have answered!

friendly: Go with divine blessing, child! The light guides your path!
May the gods watch over you! Return to us soon!
Walk in grace, dear one! The temple doors are always open!
neutral: Go in peace. May you find what you seek.
The light guide your steps. Farewell, traveler.
Walk well. Remember the temple in times of need.
hostile: Leave this holy place. Reflect on your sins.
Go. And may you find redemption somewhere.
The door is that way. Return only with a repentant heart.

friendly: Well met, fellow wanderer! What roads have you traveled?
A friendly face on the road! Always good to meet kindred spirits.
Greetings, friend! Care to swap stories of the journey?
neutral: Hail, traveler. The road is long for us all.
Another soul on the road. Where are you headed?
Greetings. Rest easy - I mean no trouble.
hostile: Keep your distance. Ive dealt with your kind before.
What do you want? Speak quickly.
Ive nothing worth stealing, if thats your aim.

friendly: Ive collected some interesting finds on my travels. Interested?
Fellow wanderer, I have items that might aid your journey!
Take a look - picked these up from distant markets.
neutral: I have some goods from my travels. Fair trade?
Looking to lighten my pack. What catches your eye?
Supplies from the road. Everything is for sale.
hostile: Trade? With you? Make it worth my while.
I suppose even rogues need supplies. What do you want?
Quick and clean, then we part ways. Deal?

friendly: Safe travels, friend! May our paths cross again!
Until we meet again! The road is full of wonders!
Farewell! May fortune favor your journey!
neutral: Safe roads, traveler. Watch for bandits.
Until next time. The road goes ever on.
Farewell. Travel well.
hostile: Going so soon? Good.
Best we go separate ways.
Dont follow me.

friendly: Whoa, friend! Easy! The road teaches you to read trouble - let's talk!
Hold on! We're both travelers here - no need for this!
Stop! I've seen enough blood on the road! Let's find another way!
neutral: Stay back! I've survived bandits worse than you!
You picked the WRONG traveler to mess with!
I've walked roads that would break you! Try me!
hostile: I KNEW you were trouble! Should have slit your throat when I had the chance!
Finally! Dropping the act! Let's finish this!
You won't be the first body I've left on the road!

friendly: Safe roads, fellow wanderer! May our paths cross again!
Until next time, friend! The journey continues for us both!
Farewell! May your travels be filled with wonder!
neutral: The road calls. Watch your back out there.
Safe travels. Hope you find what you're looking for.
On your way then. The horizon waits for no one.
hostile: Go your own way. And stay out of mine.
Good riddance. I hope we never meet again.
Leave. Before I decide you're not worth letting go.

friendly: *hic* Heyyy! My besht friend! Cmeere, have a drink!
YOUUUU! I like you! Youre good people, you are!
*burp* Friend! Frien! Buy me a round and Ill tell ya secrets!
neutral: *hic* Whozzat? Oh... *squints* ...hello there...
Heyyyy... you gonna buy me a drink or just stare?
*sway* The rooms spinning... wait, thats just you... hi.
hostile: *hic* YOU! I remember you! You owe me money!
Get outta my face... *burp* ...before I throw up on ya.
Whatre YOU lookin at, huh? HUH?!

friendly: I got stuff! Good stuff! Trade ya for... *hic* ...for drinks!
Lookit this! *shows random item* Worth a fortune! Probably!
Ill sell ya ANYTHING for another round! Best deals!
neutral: Trade? Yeah sure... *hic* ...whaddya got?
I need drinking money. Everythings for sale.
You want this? Its... *squints* ...something. Probably valuable.
hostile: You think Im stupid? *hic* I know what things are worth! Mostly!
Rob me and Ill... Ill... *forgets threat* ...just pay fair!
Tryna cheat a drunk? Thats low. Even for you.

friendly: Dont go! The night is young! *hic* ...ish...
Youre leaving? NOOOO! ...wait, who are you again?
Bye bye best frienddd! Come back soooon!
neutral: *waves vaguely* Yeah yeah... bye... *hic*
Going? Fine... leave me here... alone... with my drinks.
Later... *collapses on table*
hostile: FINE! GO! See if I care! *hic*
Good riddance! ...wait, wheres my drink?
Dont come back! ...unless youre buying!

friendly: Whoa whoa WHOA! *hic* Friend! FRIEND! Lesh not... not do anythin shtupid!
Heyyy! Easy there! *burp* Im too drunk to fight... or am I?!
Wait wait wait! *drops bottle* We can talk about thish! Have a drink!
neutral: Oh you wanna GO?! *hic* I'll show you! *swings wildly at nothing*
BRING IT! *stumbles* I was a soldier! ...or a baker... DOESNT MATTER!
Thash IT! *hic* Youve made a big mishtake, pal! HUGE!
hostile: FINALLY! *smashes bottle* Been wantin to do thish all night!
Come on then! *hic* Ill show you what happens when you mesh with a drunk!
HAHAHA! *lurches forward* You think Im scared?! Alcohol is my ARMOR!

friendly: Awww dont gooo! *hic* The night is young! ...I think...
Byebye best frienddd! *waves wildly* Come back for drinksss!
Ill... Ill miss you! *starts crying* Youre the only one who understands!
neutral: *waves bottle* Yeah yeah... off you go... *hic*
Leaving? Fine... more drinks for me then...
*burp* Whatever... see ya around... maybe...
hostile: Good! GO! *hic* Nobody likes you anyway!
Finally! ...wait, did you pay your tab?!
Get out! And DONT come back! ...unless youre sorry!

friendly: *whispers* Good to see you, friend. Keep your voice down.
Ah, someone who understands the shadows. What brings you here?
A fellow professional! Business or pleasure tonight?
neutral: *eyes your purse* Nice to meet you, friend. Watch your belongings.
Greetings, traveler. These streets can be dangerous at night.
Looking for something? I might know where to find it... for a price.
hostile: You. Ive been waiting. We have unfinished business.
Dont scream. It wont end well for you.
Your reputation precedes you. Keep your hands where I can see them.

friendly: Ive acquired some... interesting items. No questions asked?
For you, special prices on special merchandise.
Need something... obtained discreetly? I know people.
neutral: Everything here is legitimate. Mostly. What do you need?
I deal in hard-to-find items. Quality goods, fair prices.
Looking for something specific? I have connections.
hostile: Buy something or leave. I dont like your face.
Quick transaction. No chitchat. What do you want?
Gold first. Then we talk merchandise.

friendly: Disappear quietly, friend. The shadows are watching.
Until next time. Stay out of the light.
Good hunting. Dont get caught.
neutral: Watch your back out there. Not everyone is as... friendly.
Farewell. Forget you saw me.
Move along. And remember - we never met.
hostile: Run. While you still can.
This isnt over. Sleep with one eye open.
Next time we meet, it wont be to talk.

friendly: *steps back* Easy there, friend! We're on the same side, remember?
Wait! Before you do something rash - think about who you're dealing with!
Calm down! I've got friends in shadows you can't even see!
neutral: *draws dagger* You really want to do this? I've cut throats for less!
Mistake. BIG mistake. I disappear. You won't even see it coming.
Back off! I've killed better than you and no one ever found the bodies!
hostile: *grins* Finally. No more games. Let's see how well you bleed!
You've been dead since you crossed me. You just didn't know it yet.
This is what I DO. And I'm VERY good at it!

friendly: *fades into shadow* Until next time, friend. Stay invisible.
The shadows will find me if you need me. Good hunting.
Disappear. It's what we do best. I'll find you when I need to.
neutral: *steps back into darkness* Forget my face. Better for both of us.
We never met. This conversation never happened. Go.
Walk away. Don't look back. Don't remember.
hostile: *vanishes* Sleep light. Check your locks. Watch the shadows.
Go. But know this - I'll be watching. Always.
Leave. And pray you never see me again. Because you won't. Until it's too late.

friendly: Ah, you want to know the local news? Well, let me tell you...
Between us friends, I have heard some interesting rumors lately...
Since you ask, there has been talk around town about strange happenings...
neutral: Rumors? I hear things. Does not mean they are true.
People talk. Whether it is worth listening to is another matter.
There is always something happening. What specifically interests you?
hostile: Why would I share anything with you?
Mind your own business. Gossip gets people killed.
I know nothing. And even if I did, I would not tell you.

friendly: Of course! Head that way and you will find what you are looking for.
Happy to help! Let me draw you a mental map...
Absolutely! This town can be confusing - follow the main road...
neutral: That way. Cannot miss it.
Follow the road. Ask again if you get lost.
North of here. Keep your wits about you.
hostile: Figure it out yourself.
Do I look like a signpost?
Wrong person to ask. Move along.

friendly: For you, I can lower the price a bit. How about this?
Hmm, you drive a hard bargain, friend. Let us meet in the middle.
Since we are friends, I suppose I can offer you a discount...
neutral: The price is fair, but I might have some wiggle room.
Make me a reasonable offer and we will see.
Perhaps we can negotiate. What did you have in mind?
hostile: Price is final. Take it or leave it.
You want to haggle? With me? Bold.
No discounts for you. Pay full price or get out.

friendly: Whoa, whoa! Easy there, friend. No need for threats between us!
Please, there is no need for that. Let us talk this through calmly.
I-I am on your side! No need to be aggressive!
neutral: Threatening me? That is not going to work.
Careful with those threats. They tend to backfire.
Is that supposed to scare me? Try harder.
hostile: You dare threaten ME? You will regret this.
Threats? From you? Do not make me laugh.
Watch your tongue, or I will cut it out myself.

friendly: Well, since you put it that way... I suppose I could help.
You make a compelling argument, friend. Alright, you have convinced me.
How can I refuse when you ask so nicely? Consider it done.
neutral: Hmm, you make a fair point. I will consider it.
That is... actually reasonable. Fine, you have persuaded me.
Your words have some merit. Very well.
hostile: Save your silver tongue. I am not interested.
Pretty words will not work on me.
You think you can talk your way through everything? Not with me.

friendly: You do not need to offer me gold, but... I will not say no to a gift between friends!
That is very generous! Well, what did you need?
You spoil me, friend! How can I help?
neutral: Hmm... that is a nice sum. What exactly are you asking for?
I am listening. What do you want in exchange for this... donation?
Gold talks. What do you need?
hostile: Are you trying to bribe me? ...How much are we talking?
Keep your dirty money. Well... let me see it first.
This better be worth my time. And my discretion.

friendly: Of course! I offer the finest services in town. For you, special treatment!
Let me tell you what I can do for a valued friend like yourself...
Happy to help! Here is what I have available...
neutral: Services? Yes, I provide several. What specifically interests you?
I can help with a few things. Depends on what you need.
Here is what I offer. Take a look.
hostile: Services? For you? We will see about that.
What I offer is not for just anyone. Especially not you.
My services have standards. You do not meet them.

friendly: Of course I'll help you, friend! What do you need?
Anything for a friend like you! Tell me what's troubling you.
You've helped me before - now it's my turn. What can I do?
neutral: Help? Depends on what you're asking for.
I might be able to assist. What do you need?
State your request. I'll see what I can do.
hostile: Help YOU? After everything? Not likely.
Why would I lift a finger for you?
You've got nerve asking me for help. The answer is no.

friendly: Please, friend! Let's not let things go this far! What's wrong?!
Easy! Easy! Whatever's happened, we can work it out!
Stop! Think about what you're doing! I don't want to fight you!
neutral: Stay back! I'm warning you! GUARDS! HELP!
You've lost your mind! I won't just stand here and take this!
Back off NOW or you'll regret it!
hostile: So that's how it is?! FINE! Come on then!
I've been waiting for this! You'll pay for everything!
No more words! Let's END this!

friendly: Take care of yourself, friend! Come back anytime!
Safe travels! Hope to see you again soon!
Be well! The door's always open for you!
neutral: Farewell then. Watch yourself out there.
Safe travels. Hope you find what you're looking for.
Go well. Mind the roads.
hostile: Leave. And don't come back.
Good riddance. Stay gone.
Get out of my sight.

friendly: Well, well... a kindred spirit. What brings you to our camp?
Ah, you've proven yourself. Welcome, friend of the road.
One of ours now, are you? Good to have reliable folk about.
neutral: Halt there, traveler. Empty your pockets... slowly.
Nice gear you've got. It'd be a shame if something happened to it.
Lost, are we? These roads have tolls, stranger.
hostile: YOU. I remember your face. Bad blood between us.
Thought you could hide forever? Time to pay what you owe.
The boys have been waiting for you. This won't be pleasant.

friendly: Looking for something... liberated? I've got interesting stock.
For friends, I trade fair. None of that back-alley nonsense.
Take a look at what we've acquired. Good quality, low questions.
neutral: Trade? Sure. But the price includes a... handling fee.
Everything's for sale. The question is what you're willing to pay.
I might have what you need. Depends on how heavy your purse is.
hostile: Trade? With you? Hand over everything and I'll trade you your life.
The only deal you're getting is walking away intact. Maybe.
Your coin. Your gear. Now. Or this gets ugly.

friendly: There's a job needs doing. Risky, but the pay is good. Interested?
I've got work for someone with your skills. Discreet. Profitable.
A certain noble needs humbling. Think you can handle it?
neutral: You want work? Fine. There's a caravan needs... redirecting.
A job came up. Not pretty, but coin is coin. You in?
I've got something that needs doing. No questions asked. Interested?
hostile: Work? The only job you'll do is digging your own grave.
There's one task you can do - tell your friends to stay off our roads.
Quest? Here's one: survive the next five minutes.

friendly: Stay sharp out there. Not everyone's as reasonable as us.
Safe roads, friend. Come back when you've got more to trade.
Until next time. Keep your blade handy.
neutral: Move along. And remember - you saw nothing.
Off with you. Don't make us regret letting you go.
This conversation never happened. Understood?
hostile: Run. Run fast. And pray we don't cross paths again.
Next time there won't be talking. Just steel.
Consider this your only warning. Disappear.

friendly: Whoa, friend! Remember who you're with! We're on the same side!
Easy there! Save that fire for the marks, not your own crew!
Calm down! We're family out here on the road, remember?
neutral: *whistles* BOYS! We've got a fighter here!
You picked the WRONG camp to threaten! You're surrounded!
Ha! You think one sword scares us?! We've taken down caravans!
hostile: FINALLY! I've been waiting for an excuse! GET THEM, BOYS!
This is what happens to heroes! Gut them like a pig!
You walked into OUR territory! Your corpse will serve as a warning!

friendly: Stay dangerous, friend. The road provides for those who take.
Until next time. Remember - the shadows are your ally.
Go on then. And if you find good loot, you know where to sell it.
neutral: Leave. Quickly. Before the others decide you're not worth releasing.
Walk. Don't run. Don't look back. And forget this place.
You've got ten seconds to disappear. Starting now.
hostile: Run. We'll give you a head start. It's more sporting that way.
Go. Tell everyone what happens to those who cross us.
Leave before I change my mind about letting you keep your limbs.

friendly: Ah, child, come sit with me. These old bones welcome good company.
Welcome, welcome! It warms my heart to see the young ones still visit.
Bless you for stopping by. The years have been kind if they brought you here.
neutral: Yes? What brings you to an old one like me?
Hmm? Speak up, young one. My hearing isn't what it used to be.
Another traveler. Well, what is it you seek?
hostile: You dare show your face here? After what you've done?
I may be old, but I remember treachery. Leave, before I call the village.
The young think the old forget. We don't. State your business and go.

friendly: I have some trinkets from my younger days. Perhaps they'll serve you well.
Take what you need, dear. Gold means little at my age.
These old treasures deserve a new adventure. What catches your eye?
neutral: I've accumulated much over the years. Some of it might be useful to you.
Trading, are we? Let me see what I can part with.
Browse if you like. Everything has a story, and a price.
hostile: Trade with you? I'd sooner throw it in the river.
My wares aren't for the likes of you. Try the next village.
You'll get nothing from me. Not a thing.

friendly: There is something that troubles this old heart. Perhaps you could help?
In my youth, I left something unfinished. Would you see it done for me?
A request, dear child, if you have time for an old one's worries.
neutral: I have a task that needs younger legs. Interested?
Something needs doing, and I'm too old for the journey. Might you help?
There's work to be done. The reward would be worth your while.
hostile: The only task I have for you is leaving and never returning.
Quest? Yes - quest elsewhere. Far from here.
I'll give you a task: make amends for your past deeds. Then we'll talk.

friendly: Go with the blessings of one who has seen much. Safe travels, child.
May the road rise to meet you. Come visit again soon.
Farewell, dear one. You've brightened an old heart today.
neutral: Safe travels, young one. The world is full of dangers.
Go well. And try to make better choices than I did at your age.
Farewell. May your path be clearer than mine was.
hostile: Go. And don't let me see you here again.
Leave. The village has long memories, as do I.
Begone. May your conscience haunt you as your actions haunt us.

friendly: Child, child! What madness has taken you?! Calm yourself!
Please! These old bones can't take much more! Think of what you're doing!
Stop! I beg you! Violence is the folly of the young - you're better than this!
neutral: HELP! Someone! This one has gone mad!
Stay back! I've lived too long to die at the hands of a fool!
The village will hear of this! You'll face justice!
hostile: So you finally show your true nature! The elders WARNED me about you!
I may be old, but I've seen more bloodshed than you can imagine!
Come then! I've lived long enough! But I won't go quietly!

friendly: Go with the wisdom of ages, child. Visit again soon.
May your journey teach you as much as mine taught me. Farewell.
Bless you, young one. These old eyes hope to see you again.
neutral: Go well. The years pass quickly - use them wisely.
Safe travels. Remember what the old ones teach.
Farewell. May you grow wiser with age.
hostile: Leave. The village has no place for the likes of you.
Go and don't return. Age brings memory, and mine is long.
Begone. May the road teach you lessons you refused to learn here.
